thread.title: Mexican drug lord flown to Sinaloan mountains after escape - The San Diego Union-Tribune
thread.title_full: Mexican drug lord flown to Sinaloan mountains after escape - The San Diego Union-Tribune - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The San Diego Union-Tribune
title: Mexican drug lord flown to Sinaloan mountains after escape - The San Diego Union-Tribune
text:
The government is offering a reward of 60 million pesos, or about $3.5 million dollars, for Guzman's recapture after he made his second escape from a maximum security prison through an underground tunnel in 2015. The Associated Press A T-shirt of fugitive Mexican drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman covers a mannequin representing Jesus Malverde, known in Mexico as the "Saint" of drug traffickers, inside the shrine of a faith healer in Mexico City, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015.
 The San Diego Union-Tribune.
